text: User can log in using email and password
System should allow files up to 10MB to be uploaded
Page load time should be under 2 seconds
Password must have at least 8 characters and include a number
Application should handle 100 concurrent users without errors
The system should send an email after successful registration
All API responses should return within 500 milliseconds
User can reset password using OTP sent to email
Website should be accessible from mobile and desktop browsers
Search feature should return relevant results instantly
System should encrypt all user data using AES-256
Users can update profile picture and bio
The application should recover from unexpected crashes
Login should fail with invalid credentials
System must support dark mode and light mode themes
Database queries should complete under 200ms
Admin can delete and suspend user accounts
The system should maintain 99.9% uptime
User session should expire after 15 minutes of inactivity
System should log all failed login attempts
